EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification to Partner upon Registering a Deal
EmailTemplate.name: PRM Partner Lead Registration Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name} : Partner Lead Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Partner_Sub_Agent_Contact__c},
Thank you for your Lead Registration. If you have a partner portal login and password, you can monitor the status of the lead submitted. Otherwise, you will be contacted by your Channel Account Manager shortly.
Thanks,
Channel Support.
